content:
The left-most column contains the full text of the UDHR Universal Declaration of Human Rights, G.A. res. 217A (III), U.N. Doc A/810 at 71 (1948).
Locate the matching text in the middle column CDHRI Cairo Declaration on Human Rights in Islam,Aug. 5, 1990, U.N. GAOR, 
World Conf. on Hum. Rts., 4th Sess., Agenda Item 5, U.N. Doc. 
A/CONF.157/PC/62/Add.18 (1993) [English translation].
 and copy/past the text in the relevant middle column. This text may come from different clauses in the CHHRI to address the idea/clause in the first column.
Write the comments in the Right-most column about any miss-match between the left UDHR column and middle CDHR column
i will give you the UDHR statemnts2 / 2
